Today in County Sligo, it's looking good with 5 ft @10s NNW swell and fresh 15 mph S winds. Easkey Right and Dunmoran Strand are both offering clean conditions, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell shifts to 5 ft @13s WNW with lighter 8 mph SSE winds, making Strandhill and Easkey spots prime for fun surf. Day after, expect similar conditions with 5 ft @14s WNW swell and 11 mph ESE winds, keeping Strandhill and Easkey Right in the mix. Best: tomorrow.
